trans-unit.source: Remove compute nodes from a pool
trans-unit.target: Remove compute nodes from a pool

trans-unit.source: Removes compute nodes from the specified pool.
trans-unit.target: Removes compute nodes from the specified pool.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to pools.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to pools.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: POST
trans-unit.target: POST

trans-unit.source: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool from which you want to remove a node.
trans-unit.target: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool from which you want to remove a node.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: Required

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: Type

trans-unit.source: Notes
trans-unit.target: Notes

trans-unit.source: resizeTimeout
trans-unit.target: resizeTimeout

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: Time
trans-unit.target: Time

trans-unit.source: Specifies the timeout for allocation of compute nodes to the pool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the timeout for allocation of compute nodes to the pool.

trans-unit.source: If this is not specified, the default value is 10 minutes (PT10M).
trans-unit.target: If this is not specified, the default value is 10 minutes (PT10M).

trans-unit.source: This timeout is only used when EnableAutoScale is false.
trans-unit.target: This timeout is only used when EnableAutoScale is false.

trans-unit.source: The minimum value allowed for ResizeTimeout is 5 minute (PT5M).
trans-unit.target: The minimum value allowed for ResizeTimeout is 5 minute (PT5M).

trans-unit.source: If a value less than 5 minute is provided, the Batch service returns a Bad Request (400).
trans-unit.target: If a value less than 5 minute is provided, the Batch service returns a Bad Request (400).

trans-unit.source: nodeDeallocationOption
trans-unit.target: nodeDeallocationOption

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Specifies when nodes may be removed from the pool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies when nodes may be removed from the pool.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>requeue</languageKeyword> – Terminate tasks immediately and put them back on the job queue so that they are rescheduled
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>requeue</languageKeyword> – Terminate tasks immediately and put them back on the job queue so that they are rescheduled

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>terminate</languageKeyword> – Terminate running tasks.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>terminate</languageKeyword> – Terminate running tasks.

trans-unit.source: The tasks will not run again.
trans-unit.target: The tasks will not run again.

trans-unit.source: Remove nodes as soon as tasks have been terminated.
trans-unit.target: Remove nodes as soon as tasks have been terminated.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>taskcompletion</languageKeyword> – Allow currently running tasks to complete.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>taskcompletion</languageKeyword> – Allow currently running tasks to complete.

trans-unit.source: Schedule no new tasks while waiting.
trans-unit.target: Schedule no new tasks while waiting.

trans-unit.source: Remove nodes when all tasks have completed.
trans-unit.target: Remove nodes when all tasks have completed.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>retaineddata</languageKeyword> - Allow currently running tasks to complete, then wait for all task data retention periods to expire.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>retaineddata</languageKeyword> - Allow currently running tasks to complete, then wait for all task data retention periods to expire.

trans-unit.source: Schedule no new tasks while waiting.
trans-unit.target: Schedule no new tasks while waiting.

trans-unit.source: Remove nodes when all task retention periods have expired.
trans-unit.target: Remove nodes when all task retention periods have expired.

trans-unit.source: The default value is requeue.
trans-unit.target: The default value is requeue.

trans-unit.source: nodeList
trans-unit.target: nodeList

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: Collection
trans-unit.target: Collection

trans-unit.source: A list containing the ids of the compute nodes to be removed from the specified pool.
trans-unit.target: A list containing the ids of the compute nodes to be removed from the specified pool.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: Status code: 202.
trans-unit.target: Status code: 202.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: This operation can only run when the allocationState of the pool is <languageKeyword>steady</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: This operation can only run when the allocationState of the pool is <languageKeyword>steady</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: When this operation runs, the allocationState changes from <languageKeyword>steady</languageKeyword> to <languageKeyword>resizing</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: When this operation runs, the allocationState changes from <languageKeyword>steady</languageKeyword> to <languageKeyword>resizing</languageKeyword>.
